get_cities_states_dictionaries[source]

get_cities_states_dictionaries()

Returns 2 dictionaries:

  1. cities_dict - city code (6 dig): city name
  2. states_dict - state code (2 dig): state name

treat_srag_data(df, selected_columns='BASIC', aditional_columns=[])
